title: Can we convert the ap ratio on yi's meditate
body:
to %hp? There's literally no room in his kit for ap anymore and converting the ap ratio to %hp would promote building him tanky. 
It doesn't have to be anything insane even just 5% max hp at all levels would be a major improvement. (base heal of 110 + 10% max hp over 4s)

That'd take his heal from a base heal of 110 (for a maximum base of 440hp total max of 880hp) to a base heal of 110 + 27 (for a maximum base heal of 440 + 108 and total max of 880 + 216)

*Ratio's are based on Master Yi level 18

*HP ratio's as assuming no additional health points are built
